page.title: 20Recreation and Sport
page.content: On the new Recreation Field there is a football pitch,two tennis courts and an adventure playground.A cricket square will be ready for use in 1986 and a cricket team will be formed. Younger players will be coached by parents in the nets.Tollerton Tennis Club was formed in 1965.From the 20 members a team is formed for league matches.There are some junior members. The Badminton Club was formed in 1976. Both adults and children may join,they play in the Village Hall. We visited three Public Houses in Tollerton.The Black Horse is 300 years old.It is owned by Bass Brewery.The Station Hotel is a free house.It was once a farm.It is about 200 years old. The Black Bull,a free house is 95 years old.They all serve bar meals and two provide bed and breakfast accommodation.All three are well used.
